content: Write design document for Duck Hunt game
Set up pygame project structure and basic game window
Create duck sprites and animation system
Implement duck movement patterns and spawning
Implement shooting mechanics and hit detection
Create scoring system and UI elements
Add sound effects (gunshot, duck quack, hit sounds)
Implement game states (menu, playing, game over)
Add difficulty progression (faster ducks, more ducks)
Polish with backgrounds and visual effects
